resources.string: This is a sample description of a game. This game is really awesome except is not a game at all. It only serves the purpose of making you think that it is a game so that we will get a good grade on this assignment. If we could actually implement games, we would be a lot further along as developers then we actually are. We pretty much are shooting blindly on this project and hoping we hit a good grade. Now I need to see if it scrolls. ddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddd
\nThis application was created by Greg Volpe, Cody Cullens, Matt Noyce, and Carlos Vicuna. \n

Greg Volpe: Layout Design, Android Framework, Android Navigation, Language Expert 

Cody Cullens: Android to Server connection, Android Networking, Database Design, Database Implementation 

Carlos Vicuna: Database Design, Database Implementaion 

Matt Noyce: Documentation, Database Design, Database Implementation
